static CLocaleSettings * NewL (TDesC16 &aLocaleDLLName, CConsoleBase *aConsole)

Detailed Description

This class stores the locale settings of a locale DLL. It also defines functions to display these settings.
See also:
TExtendedLocale.

TLocale.
